[Home](./index.md) &gt; [lgpio](./lgpio.md) &gt; [serialRead](./lgpio.serialread.md)

## serialRead() function

This function reads up to `rxBuf.length` bytes from the serial device.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function serialRead(handle: number, rxBuf: Uint8Array): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  handle | number | The serial device handle as returned by [serialOpen()](./lgpio.serialopen.md) |
|  rxBuf | Uint8Array | The buffer to receive the data read from the device |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

The number of bytes read from the device
